text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to add an extra email address on linkedin?
text.Response A: Sure, it’s pretty easy! You can go to your account settings and then click on the “Add a new email address” link on the right hand side. LinkedIn will then send a verification email to your new address. Once you verify the new email address, you can use it to log in to LinkedIn.
text.Response B:
Launch an Internet browser.
Head to LinkedIn.
Log into your LinkedIn account.
Go to the Review menu.
Access your Account settings.
Add an email address.
Exit the menu.

915.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to add an extra email address on linkedin?

Response A

Sure, it’s pretty easy! You can go to your account settings and then click on the “Add a new email address” link on the right hand side. LinkedIn will then send a verification email to your new address. Once you verify the new email address, you can use it to log in to LinkedIn.

Response B

Launch an Internet browser.
Head to LinkedIn.
Log into your LinkedIn account.
Go to the Review menu.
Access your Account settings.
Add an email address.
Exit the menu.
